desc: Holistic ID: a results-oriented approach to design based in epigenetics, neuroplasticity, human flourishing & desire. When our home & subconscious align with our vision of an "ideal" life, we activate their hidden power in our life, supporting our desires & everything we do.

layout.text: Discover NeuroSpatial Linguistics: We are under the influence of whatever our home communicates.

The School of Holistic Design® offers a results oriented process for tuning our home & subconscious mind with our values, desires & intentions, accelerating our vision of an ideal life. Based in epigenetics, neuroplasticity & desire.
